name: Morels (itch)
description:
Morels is a real card game that I made a virtual version of so I could play it with my friends. 

It works of a LAN connection - one person selects "Host" and the other person selects "Connect," then types in the Host's IP address (which should appear on the host's screen).

The rules of the game can be found here:

https://www.ultraboardgames.com/morels/game-rules.php
